title: Process a Truck Arriving at the Gate
description: A truck arrives at the port gate to pick up an import container. The gate clerk must process its entry.

tasks.description: Identify the truck license plate and container number from the gate's OCR camera system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk's system correctly displays the truck and container identifiers.

tasks.description: Verify the truck has a valid appointment (VBS) and the container has been cleared by customs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk confirms a valid appointment and 'Customs Cleared' status for the container.

tasks.description: Issue a job ticket to the driver with the container's yard location and instruct them to proceed.
tasks.expected_outcome: A ticket is printed, and the gate barrier is opened.
